key_competitive_insights.voice_ai_gap: NONE of the 18 agencies researched offer Voice AI or AI agents for small businesses - this is our KEY DIFFERENTIATOR
key_competitive_insights.pricing_transparency: Only 1 of 18 agencies (Comrade) shows public pricing - transparent pricing is a competitive advantage

starter_package.rationale: Below Comrade's PPC package ($1,450) but above basic web design ($599). Competitive entry point that includes VOICE AI which no competitor offers.
starter_package.competitive_position: Best value in market - includes AI technology competitors don't have

growth_package.rationale: Below SEO-only packages ($2,500) but includes Voice AI + multi-channel. Sweet spot for serious small businesses.
growth_package.competitive_position: Premium value - Voice AI + lead gen at SEO-only prices

enterprise_package.rationale: Below Comrade's all-in-one ($4,299) but includes full Voice AI suite. Premium without enterprise pricing.
enterprise_package.competitive_position: Full service + AI at competitors' basic all-in-one price

value_proposition_vs_competitors.vs_traditional_agencies: We include Voice AI technology that handles calls 24/7 - something NO traditional agency offers at any price
value_proposition_vs_competitors.vs_ai_competitors: We combine AI with proven lead generation (FB/Google Ads) - not just chatbots
unique_features: 24/7 AI Voice Agent (competitors charge $30k+/yr for human receptionists)
